actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that an unmarried individual shall be treated as a head of a household if the individual maintains a household for a child of such individual, without regard to whether such household is the home of such individual.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to expand the class of individuals taxed as "heads of households" to include persons maintaining separate households for their dependent children.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that an unmarried individual shall be treated as a head of a household if the individual maintains a household for a child of such individual, without regard to whether such household is the home of such individual.
